SELECT CC_NAME,CC_IMG,P_ID,P_PDATE,P_UPLOADDATE,P_MAXPEOPLE,P_HOLE,P_CADDYYN,P_BABYN,P_CARTYN,P_PRICE,P_CONTENT,m.USER_NO user_no,P_VCOUNT,NICKNAME,LOC_NAME,g.LOC_ID loc_id FROM PRODUCT p join GOLFCC g on p.CC_ID = g.CC_ID join MEMBERLIST m on p.USER_NO = m.USER_NO JOIN LOCATION l on l.LOC_ID = g.LOC_ID where '1'='1'
and g.loc_id = #{loc_id}
and ${productDivision} like '%'||#{productValue}||'%'
order by ${productOrderby} asc
order by p_pdate asc
